name: A frostworm's serrated mandible (1h)
data: It has awesome weapon class for its type (decent in general).
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It does cold damage like a god.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'anatomy'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases damage a tiny bit.
The serrated blade more easily inflicts grievous wounds.
The tip of the blade serves as a focal point for intense cold.
